snippet: A 21-year-old was charged with first-degree murder in the death of a popular police officer, shifting attention to increased gang violence in Colorado.
abstract: Rollin Oliver is charged with first-degree murder in the death of Celena Hollis, a popular local police officer, during outdoor jazz concert in Denver; incident, which has deeply shaken the city, is shifting public attention to Denver's increased gang violence.
lead_paragraph: A 21-year-old was charged with first-degree murder in the death of a popular police officer, shifting attention to increased gang violence in Colorado.

headline.seo: Officer Shooting in Denver a Reminder of Gang Problems
headline.main: Officer’s Death Reminds a City of Work to Be Done
headline.print_headline: Officer’s Death Reminds a City of Work to Be Done
